## TextAreaBuilderOptions.validate property

Validation function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
validate?: ValidateFunc;
```

## Remarks

Called on every change to validate the current textarea content. Return `null` for valid input, or an `Error` with a descriptive message for invalid input. The error message can be displayed to the user in the UI.

## Example


```typescript
validate: (value) => {
  const lines = value.split('\n')
  if (lines.length > 10) return new Error('Maximum 10 lines allowed')
  return null
}
```
